name: Alan T. Sherman
content: Alan T. Sherman (Home Page) Alan Theodore Sherman Professor, Computer Science Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering (CSEE) University of Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC) Research Interests High-integrity voting systems, information assurance, cryptology, discrete algorithms. Sherman's official CSEE webpage. Research, publications, CV, grants Courses Research students Activities Hobbies, fun, from my past Links Contact me Security Consulting Services I am available for professional consulting projects (including expert witness testimony) in security of voting systems, cryptology, communications security, and information assurance. Alan T. Sherman, sherman@umbc.edu Last Modified: February 21, 2008.
